title: Dell security advisory (AV25-121)
description: Between March 3 and 9, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Dell Data Protection Search   versions 19.6.0, 19.6.1, 19.6.2, 19.6.3, 19.6.4 and 19.6.5
Dell Integrated Data Protection Appliance   version 2.7.8 and prior
Dell Secure Connect Gateway - Appliance   version 5.26.00.20
PowerStore 1000X, 3000X, 5000X, 7000X and 9000X   versions prior to ESXi70U3s-24585291
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
